data.description: WALK TO TRAIN AND HISTORIC DOWNTOWN LOMBARD! Charming 3 Bedroom 1.1 Bath raised Ranch home nestled on a mature tree lined street. Step into the inviting 2 story Foyer, and up to the main floor living spaces featuring: a Living Room with gleaming hardwood floors and built-ins; a lovely bright updated eat-in Kitchen with cherry cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, and a pass through opening to the Living Room anchored by a serving counter and more formal cabinetry with glass fronts, making for ideal flow when entertaining family and friends. Sliding glass door from the Kitchen leads to the heart of this home, the amazing pine paneled 3 season Sunroom with a volume ceiling, radiant floor and over-head heating, a ceiling fan, an abundance of windows, and a door to the deck and patio offering lovely views of the professionally landscaped fenced backyard. The main floor is completed by 3 Bedrooms with hardwood floors, and a Hall Bath. The lower level features: a bright Family Room space with carpeting, a Powder Room, Laundry Room with stackable front loading washer and dryer, and utility sink. 2 car Garage with bump out area great for use as a work shop or storage. Additional outdoor storage under sunroom. Downtown Lombard is rich in historic charm with its quaint streets, one of a kind boutiques and restaurants, and Lombard Park District's Lilacia Park.... an 8.5-acre horticultural showcase featuring 700 lilacs and 25,000 tulips each Spring! GREAT LOCATION IN QUIET FAMILY FRIENDLY NEIGHBORHOOD!   Features and Improvements Include:  Siding (2004), Sunroom with heated floor and above radiant heat (2009), Kitchen and appliances (2011), Electrical Panel for Generator (2008), Washer-Dryer (2013), Furnace & Air Conditioner (2015),  Solid wood interior 6 panel doors (2017), Garage Door Opener (2018), remodel of living room and entry foyer with refinished hardwood floors (2018), backyard fencing (2020).
